titles.title: Leadership PAC Limitation Act
To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit the conversion of leadership PAC funds to personal use.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Elections.

bill.summary: 1/12/2011--Introduced. Leadership PAC Limitation Act - Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit the conversion of leadership PAC funds to personal use.
